title: 1697: HIIT Training Doesn’t Work (Unless You Follow These Steps)
description:
In this episode Sal, Adam & Justin discuss everything HIIT 

  • HIIT training season is here! (1:26)
  • Busting the myths surrounding HIIT. (6:00)
  • Who is HIIT training for? (7:36)
  • How has HIIT training been abused? (9:24)
  • HIIT Training Doesn’t Work (Unless You Follow These Steps). (13:49)
  • Step #1 – Programming matters! (15:30)
  • Step #2 – Have perfect form. (18:10)
  • Step #3 – Use rest periods as a tool to compose yourself. (23:06)
  • Step #4 – Apply plyometrics properly. (28:04)
  • Step #5 – Phase your programming. (32:35)
  • Step #6 – Focus on mobility. (38:24)
  • Why everyone should start as a beginner. (41:57)
